<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Walk the Plank](/Feats.aspx?ID=6381) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 209 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Pirate](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=258)

**Prerequisites**
[Pirate Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6378)

</column>

---

You [frighten](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76)  a foe into moving where you want them, traditionally demanding they walk the plank. Attempt to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=2395) an opponent. On a success, in addition to the normal effects, you can also force the target to [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=2305) up to its Speed immediately. You choose the path the target takes, but you can't force it to move into an obviously harmful space (such as into hazardous terrain or a space where it would fall) unless your check was a critical success. As normal for forced movement, this movement doesn't trigger reactions. The target then becomes temporarily immune to Walk the Plank for 10 minutes.
name: Walk the Plank
